UIControllers

Class StudentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • UIControllers.StudentController

  • public class StudentController
extends java.lang.Object

    Student Controller Class

    This class controls all activities of the students GUI page

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws java.text.ParseException
        This function initializes a view of all the courses that are available in the institute This is the first page that comes up when a student logs in

        java.text.ParseException - throws exception when there is a parsing error

      • handleGenerateCourse

        public void handleGenerateCourse(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                 java.text.ParseException
        This function Generates and displays all pertinant courses to a student It filters out based on search parameter, non clashing courses and those that the student has not yet selected
        Parameters:
        keyEvent - key event, checks whether the enter key has been pressed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when input or output stream is not initialized
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - exception thrown when requested class not found
        java.text.ParseException - Exception thrown when there is a string parsing error
